law.catch_line: In this section, "taxpayer identity information" means a taxpayer's:...

text.section:
In this section, "taxpayer identity information" means a taxpayer's:
name;
address; and
identifying number, as described in § 6109 of the Internal Revenue Code.

section.section:
If the Comptroller discloses taxpayer identity information to a person under a contract described in paragraph (1)(v)1 of this subsection, the person:
shall use that information only to obtain telephone numbers for the Comptroller; and
may not use any telephone number or taxpayer identity information or disclose the information to any other person.
